hadiths.text: Narrated Mujahid:I was in the company of Ibn `Abbas and the people talked about Ad-Dajjal and said, "Ad-Dajjal will come with the word Kafir (non-believer) written in between his eyes." On that Ibn `Abbas said, "I have not heard this from the Prophet (ﷺ) but I heard him saying, 'As if I saw Moses just now entering the valley reciting Talbyia

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّلْبِيَةِ إِذَا انْحَدَرَ فِي الْوَادِي
chapter.eng-name: Reciting Talbiya on entering a valley
